ygData.subject: RE: Skill cap on Dual Wield?
ygData.msgSnippet: actually it must be 255... cuz last i saw mine was 251. not that 5pts really matter @that stage in the game.) ... From: Adam Hayek [mailto:Adam@thirdlaw.com]
ygData.messageBody:
actually it must be 255... cuz last i saw mine was 251.

not that 5pts really matter @that stage in the game.)

-----Original Message-----
From: Adam Hayek [mailto:Adam@...]
Sent: Sunday, July 25, 1999 9:05 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Skill cap on Dual Wield?


From: Adam Hayek <Adam@...>

no, the cap is 250

> whether or not they have gotten past this number?
